name: Cf7Save Extension
author: P3JX

sections.description:
This plugin will save contact form 7 sumbition into database

Data can view through backend. Contact -> submitted data

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Save to Database
  2. View in backend
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Contact-> screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
How to use the plugin?

After activating the plugin go to “Contact -> Submitted Forms”. You can see a drop down with submitted form names that created in CF7. Select the form that you want to view.

short_description: This Plugins Saves Contact form 7 Form submission into Database. You can Preview & Export.
